entities.name: ArticleTemplate
entities.description: Template for a knowledge base article that contains the standard attributes of an article.

attributes.name: kbArticleTemplateId
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the knowledge base article template.

attributes.name: structureXml
attributes.description: XML structure of the knowledge base article.

attributes.name: organizationId
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the organization associated with the template.

attributes.name: formatXml
attributes.description: XML format of the knowledge base article template.

attributes.name: title
attributes.description: Title of the knowledge base article template.

attributes.name: description
attributes.description: Description of the knowledge base article template.

attributes.name: isActive
attributes.description: Information about whether the knowledge base article is active.

attributes.name: createdBy
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the user who created the knowledge base article template.

attributes.name: modifiedBy
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the user who last modified the knowledge base article template.

attributes.name: createdOn
attributes.description: Date and time when the knowledge base article template was created.

attributes.name: modifiedOn
attributes.description: Date and time when the knowledge base article template was last modified.

attributes.name: overriddenCreatedOn
attributes.description: Date and time that the record was migrated.

attributes.name: languageCode
attributes.description: Language of the Article Template

attributes.name: importSequenceNumber
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the data import or data migration that created this record.

attributes.name: kbArticleTemplateIdUnique
attributes.description: For internal use only.

attributes.name: componentState
attributes.description: For internal use only.

attributes.name: solutionId
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the associated solution.

attributes.name: overwriteTime
attributes.description: For internal use only.

attributes.name: createdOnBehalfBy
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the delegate user who created the kbarticletemplate.

attributes.name: modifiedOnBehalfBy
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the delegate user who last modified the kbarticletemplate.

attributes.name: isCustomizable
attributes.description: Information that specifies whether this component can be customized.

attributes.name: introducedVersion
attributes.description: Version in which the form is introduced.
